channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Gurdon Road - full of litter, 1st December
item.description:
Hi there, Gurdon Road in Charlton requires sweeping. Looks like it has not been cleaned for weeks if not months. Lidia

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gurdon Road, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken fence next to pedestrian pavement, 1st December
item.description:
Hi there, As per attached pictures, there is a broken fence next to the bus stop opposite Anytime Fitness. Can this be looked into and address asap? Best, Lidia

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woolwich Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Domestic Rubbish Dumped, 1st December
item.description:
Same location / same culprits! For info, this accumulation of domestic waste started to pile up within 1x minute of street cleaners removing the weekends debris.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beckenham Road, Penge, Greater London

item.title: Flytip, 1st December
item.description:
Large/tall rectangular cardboard box with material waste or whatever left on pavement around this location.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albemarle Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter Overload at Recycle Site, 1st December
item.description:
The recycle site has a MASSIVE flytip and litter issue as of this evening. There is a HUGE cardboard problem that needs addressing asap as the containers are overflowing. There is also a nasty litter issue around the back of many containers (why can you walk behind them?). Large flytip issue behind the locker type containers in the corner. Also, one of those lockers is stuck open. The entire site is being abused badly and doesn't look like its been cleared or looked after in some time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albemarle Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: German camper people living in it, 1st December
item.description:
Camper reported is still!!!! In Street it's moved 140 meters or so Sunday night.. No idea why council couldn't see it.. it's obvious enough I could see in the dark from 400 metres away.. When I came home Monday night..its the German double cab box van.. Made it to some sort of camper fillty looking thing with people living in it..
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Maidstone Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken water pipe, 1st December
item.description:
Reporting a leak in the communal parking area of the estate. The leak appears to be coming from the pipe itself or a blocked drain at the base. I’ve attached photos showing the wate

item.title: Far too many leaves built up, 1st December
item.description:
Massive buildup of dead leaves - seemingly no clearing this autumn. Deep banks of dead leaves particularly near church. Will gradually rot in wet weather and block drains, causing flooding
